Pascal Example:
```pascal
    
    SkillValue := GetSkillCurrentValue('Inscription');
    if SkillValue > GetSkillCap('Inscription') then

      AddToSystemJournal('SkillCap reached, Halt');
      Halt;
    end;
//etc.
```
